meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Money Wendy Hayes Ashok Poozhikunnel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6516.

td.p: Steve Money, an international education specialist from Washington, D.C.
Wendy Hayes, a project specialist from Kansas City, Missouri
Ashok Poozhikunnel, an underwriter from Wheaton, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $39,601)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(How do you) whistle

Steve
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
WendyWho is Babe Ruth?
$1,600
SteveWho is Babe Ruth
$6,000
AshokWho is Babe Ruth?
$7,201
Babe Ruth')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'A bio from 1974, 26 years after his death, quotes him: "I swing big... I hit big or I miss big. I like to live as big as I can"')

tr.td: A bio from 1974, 26 years after his death, quotes him: "I swing big... I hit big or I miss big. I like to live as big as I can"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
